title: Migrate Java Tests to Kotlin
description: Select Java tests and migrate them to Kotlin, including compilation verification
example_prompt:
Please help migrate Java tests to Kotlin by:
1. Finding and selecting 5 Java test files
2. Converting each test to Kotlin while maintaining functionality
3. Removing original Java files
4. Verifying compilation with gradle
5. Generating migration diffs

For each test file:
- Create equivalent Kotlin test
- Maintain test structure and assertions
- Verify compilation success
- Generate diff for review
